title: Pork and Prawn Wonton Soup
ingredients: ['225g (8 oz) boneless pork loin, coarsely chopped', '50g (2 oz) peeled prawns, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon Chinese rice wine or sake', '1 tablespoon light soy sauce', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh root ginger', '1 bunch finely chopped spring onions', '24 wonton wrappers', '750ml (1 1/4 pints) chicken stock']
